'''Warūa''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A young Huana holds out his hands as if to catch an incoming missile. He winces in concentration, and an orb of water rises and floats midair. Sweat drips down his nose.

He flinches, and in that instance the water loses all shape and splashes on the floor. Crestfallen, he sighs and drops his stance.}}
Warua is an initiate watershaper trying to master the second form, however, while he understands Mairu's teachings, he has problems implementing them correctly.

* After Tekehu picks on him a bit if you have him in the party, you can give him advice (requires a [Chanter](/chanter/) class, [Tekēhu](/tekehu/) present, admitting you have no idea - or lying).
}}

## Trivia

* Warūa uses an incorrect portrait in-game, belonging to a different character. He has two named portraits, both of which are unused.
